vsParam:
Radiata, we made super good nutrient!
Any flower will bounce back with it!

Thank you so much for all these!
Please work this time... Please!
Every... Everyone, look! The leaves... and the flower... have all recovered now! It worked!

The nutrient... is really effective! I think its effect is
as good as that of the permanent nutrient soil.

That's the nutrient soil specially cultivated for
this flower which will take 500 years of the Ambrosias.

I think [px] could make the permanent nutrient soil
as an impressive alchemist!

[px]! Could you synthesize the permanent nutrient soil
in 500 years!?
I... I think it's a bit hard...
By then, it may be my great great great grandson...

Um... Really!?
Um, sorry to put you on the spot...
But I could get the flower out of the soil for now!
Um... Thank you so much for your help as we just met!

Hehe, you're welcome.
We're supposed to help those in trouble!

Haha, well said!
Now we should go to find Lycoris.
Oh, um, can I go with you if it's not too much trouble?

Lycoris hasn't come back yet.
I can't wait any longer...

Yeah, let's go find her together.
Radiata, welcome to join us and find her!

Yes!
It's my honor to join you!
